doc.after: The Eiffel Tower as seen from the Champ de Mars At 324 metres 1 063 ft tall the tower an iron lattice tower is the tallest building in Paris the most visited paid monument in the world as well as one of the most recognizable structures in the world Named after its designer Gustave Eiffel it was built as an entrance arch for the 1889 Exposition Universelle and has since become the most prominent symbol of both Paris and France
